subject: NERC Reliability Compliance Strategies Webinar  April 17
body:
Countdown to NERC: Mandatory Electric Reliability Compliance Strategies Webinar -- by AssurX and Vines Group -- April 17, 2007


















On April 17, 2007 AssurX, Inc. and the Vines Group will be hosting a Webinar covering strategies for dealing with the mandatory NERC electric reliability compliance standards. Experts from AssurX and the Vines Group will discuss the current state of affairs and provide attendees with an overview of the urgent need for compliance management as a result of the newly mandated federal reliability standards initiative and offer some strategies for establishing a robust compliance program.





Agenda

Current status of NERC compliance process
Registration process
Self-certifications by entity


Elements of a strong compliance management program
What it means to be “Auditably Compliant”
Why compliance documentation has to be “Readily Retrievable”
Why is self-reporting and gap analysis tracking important?
How an effective Corrective Action Program supports compliance management


Establishing ownership within the organization
At what level is ownership assigned
What ownership means


Staffing a new utility compliance organization
Initial compliance validation, documentation, and certification needs
Program management needs (centralized and decentralized viewpoints)


An auditor’s viewpoint of compliance


Common pitfalls during compliance management implementation
Lack of flexibility
Inadequate initial documentation
Insufficient reporting and tracking capability


AssurX, provider of CATSWeb ER (Electric Reliability) compliance system will demonstrate its business solution offering.


Q&A session


Who Should Attend
The presentations will benefit a wide range of power generation and distribution industry members, including regulatory, quality, operations, compliance and power/transmission executives and managers.

Schedule
Please join us for this 1-hour session that will include a 45-minute presentation by the featured speakers, followed by an interactive Q&A session.

Join Us
April 17, 2007 - 10:00 AM Pacific/1:00 PM Eastern

To register for this Webinar: http://www.assurx.com/NERCSignup.html


Speaker Bio
Dale Vines is Managing Director of The Vines Group, a consulting firm specializing in Regulatory Compliance and Risk Management for electric utilities and power providers. Mr. Vines has worked in a variety of operational and corporate roles for major U.S. electric utilities as well as the nuclear power industry, and has led teams assessing organizational effectiveness against regulatory standards, industry-developed criteria, and operational best practices. He has played key roles in developing the regulatory compliance processes for the emerging transition to mandatory reliability standards, and deploying Enterprise Risk Management programs. Mr. Vines holds a Bachelors Degree in Electrical Engineering (Power Option) from Mississippi State University and a MBA in Finance and Management from Tulane University.
